column4: has anyone problems with latest xorg-xserver-core in dapper? Since the latest update I'm getting "Segmentation Fault" everytime I try to launch the X server :?
make bug report (or look if one allready exists) and wait for update....

I've been looking for a bug report and waiting for an update but nothing (this if from 4-5 days ago), and filling a bug report myself... I don't know if this issue is happening only to me, so I was asking here about it :)
